name: Duplicate role for the same contact name
description: Flags accounts where the same contact name appears more than once with the same role.
message_template: Account '{account_name}' has {duplicate_count} contacts named {contact_name} with the role '{role_title}'.

context_fields.account_id: Salesforce ID for the account that owns the duplicated contacts.
context_fields.contact_name: Combined first and last name for the contact, formatted for display.
context_fields.role: The shared role value assigned to the duplicated contacts in its normalized form.
context_fields.role_title: The shared role value formatted for display.
context_fields.duplicate_count: Number of contacts that share the same name and role.
context_fields.contact_ids: List of Salesforce contact IDs that triggered the alert.

name: Missing role on account contact relation
description: Highlights account-contact relationships that have no role specified.
message_template: Contact {contact_name} linked to account '{account_name}' has no assigned role.

context_fields.contact_id: Salesforce ID for the related contact.

name: Same contact name with different roles
description: Surfaces contacts that are linked to an account with multiple, conflicting roles.
message_template: Account '{account_name}' has contact {contact_name} listed with multiple roles: {role_list}.

context_fields.roles: List of distinct roles associated with the contact.
context_fields.role_list: Comma-separated list of the distinct roles.
context_fields.role_count: Number of unique roles assigned to the contact.

name: Duplicate contact points for a contact
description: Detects duplicate phone numbers or email addresses across a contact's communication channels.

context_fields.value_kind: Type of contact point that is duplicated (phone or email).
context_fields.value_kind_title: Title-cased version of the duplicated contact point type.
context_fields.value_label: Human-friendly label for the duplicated contact point type.
context_fields.duplicate_values: List of duplicated values detected for the contact.
context_fields.duplicate_value_list: Comma-separated list of duplicated values for display.
context_fields.source_counts: Mapping of normalized values to the number of times they were seen.

parameters.value_kind: Optional filter that returns results only for a specific value kind (phone or email).
